CustomField.formula: CASE(Subject, "Welcome to Trusted Shops!", if(OR(SuppliedEmail="members@trustedshops.com", SuppliedEmail="members@e.trustedshops.com", SuppliedEmail="marketing@e.trustedshops.com"),1,0), "Thank you for your membership application - your details are now being checked", if(OR(SuppliedEmail="members@trustedshops.com", SuppliedEmail="members@e.trustedshops.com", SuppliedEmail="marketing@e.trustedshops.com"),1,0), "Thank you for registering with Trusted Shops",if(OR(SuppliedEmail="members@trustedshops.com", SuppliedEmail="members@e.trustedshops.com", SuppliedEmail="marketing@e.trustedshops.com"),2,0), "Congratulations! You're a Trusted Shops member now!", if(OR(SuppliedEmail="members@trustedshops.com", SuppliedEmail="members@e.trustedshops.com", SuppliedEmail="marketing@e.trustedshops.com"),4,0), "Welcome! Get started with Trusted Shops now", if(OR(SuppliedEmail="members@trustedshops.com", SuppliedEmail="members@e.trustedshops.com", SuppliedEmail="marketing@e.trustedshops.com"),4,0), "Congratulations! More services are now included in your membership", if(OR(SuppliedEmail="members@trustedshops.com", SuppliedEmail="members@e.trustedshops.com", SuppliedEmail="marketing@e.trustedshops.com"),3,0), "Congratulations! Even more domains included in your membership", if(OR(SuppliedEmail="members@trustedshops.com", SuppliedEmail="members@e.trustedshops.com", SuppliedEmail="marketing@e.trustedshops.com"),3,0), "We are there for you: Your contact person at Trusted Shops", if(OR(SuppliedEmail="members@trustedshops.com", SuppliedEmail="members@e.trustedshops.com", SuppliedEmail="marketing@e.trustedshops.com"),5,0), "Get to know our team", if(OR(SuppliedEmail="members@trustedshops.com", SuppliedEmail="members@e.trustedshops.com", SuppliedEmail="marketing@e.trustedshops.com"),5,0), 0)
CustomField.label: Application Subject EN
